sentence.Network_cn: 一些公司已降低了宣传资料中标榜之词的调门。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense knowledge of books): via French from Latin litteratura, from littera (see letter)

entry.def: Novels, plays, and poetry are referred to as literature, especially when they are considered to be good or important.

entry.tran: （某一学科的）著述，文献，图书资料
entry.def: The literature on a particular subject of study is all the books and articles that have been published about it.

example.ex: The literature on immigration policy is almost unrelievedly critical of the state...
example.tran: 关于移民政策方面的著述几乎总是会一成不变地批评政府。

example.ex: This work is documented in the scientific literature.
example.tran: 这一著作被列为科学文献。

entry.def: Literature is written information produced by people who want to sell you something or give you advice.

example.ex: I am sending you literature from two other companies that provide a similar service...
example.tran: 我把另外两家提供类似服务的公司的宣传资料发给你。

example.ex: Some companies have toned down the claims on their promotional literature.
example.tran: 一些公司已降低了宣传资料中标榜之词的调门。

means.word_mean: 1. creative writing of recognized artistic value
2. the humanistic study of a body of literature;

sentences.sentence: "he took a course in Russian lit"

means.word_mean: 3. published writings in a particular style on a particular subject;

sentences.sentence: "one aspect of Waterloo has not yet been treated in the literature"

means.word_mean: 4. the profession or art of a writer;

auth_sentence.content: This is not a fair reflection of the literature.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not a fair reflection of the literature.

auth_sentence.content: Chinese dragons have a lot of literature about them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Chinese dragons have a lot of literature about them.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,-sure通常加在s结尾的词根后,表示"一般状态,行为等等"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 文学,文学作品,文献,图书资料,印刷品
stems_affixes.word_buile: liter文字+ature一般状态,行为等等→文字状态→文学

Sentence.sentence: Paperbacks of popular literature are more likely to be replaced by e-books.
Well, I know in my case, I did an English literature degree and I didn't really expect to end up doing what I am doing now.
Educators may fear that children hearing two languages will become permanently confused and thus their language development will be delayed ;this concern is not documented in the literature.
Schweitzer concedes his research runs counter to a very large body of literature that commends the many benefits of goal-setting.
It runs counter to the existing literature on the subject

sentences.en: He was an expert on ancient Chinese astronomical literature.
sentences.cn: 他是研究中国古代天文学文献的专家。

jushi.english: There is now an extensive literature dealing with the Second World War.
jushi.chinese: 现在有大量描写第二次世界大战的著作。

jushi.english: He was an expert on ancient Chinese astronomical literature.
jushi.chinese: 他是研究中国古代天文学文献的专家。

jushi.english: He studies both Chinese and English literatures.
jushi.chinese: 他研究中国文学和英国文学。
